mapper.update: UPDATE `order_info` set has_delete=#{hasDelete}, delete_type=#{deleteType} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT info.id, info.odd, cp.name as company, info.status AS order_status, payment.payment AS payment, payment.status AS payment_status, info.delete_type AS delete_type, info.create_date FROM order_payment as payment, order_info as info LEFT JOIN data_company as cp ON info.company = cp.id WHERE info.id = payment.order_id AND info.has_delete = #{has_delete} ${sql}

SELECT info.id, info.odd, cp.name as company, info.rec_name AS recName, info.rec_tel AS recTel, info.rec_address AS recAddress, info.remark AS remark, info.status AS orderStatus, info.create_date FROM order_payment as payment, order_info as info LEFT JOIN data_company as cp ON info.company = cp.id WHERE info.id = payment.order_id ${sql}
